organization.name: united-kingdom-atomic-energy-authority
organization.title: United Kingdom Atomic Energy Authority
organization.description: The UK Atomic Energy Authority carries out fusion research in the UK on behalf of the government and manages the JET fusion project on behalf of the EU at the Culham Centre for Fusion Energy (CCFE).

result.title: Authority Pension Scheme Records

extras.value: N/A Internal Use Only.  There is no plan to release this information due to its personal nature. The scheme does produce annual report and accounts submitted to Parliament.
